A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend application connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Functionality for users to create new chess games
Functionality for users to join existing chess games
Interactive chessboard allowing users to move pieces according to chess rules
Ability for users to undo their last move
Option for users to resign from a game
Interface controls for selecting different board themes
Interface controls for selecting difficulty levels
Display area showing game history including all moves made
Section for viewing player statistics such as wins, losses, and win rate
Real-time synchronization of game state between players
User authentication system to manage player sessions
Responsive layout styled with alice blue background and steel blue interface elements
Configuration in package.json to install dependencies for both frontend and backend with 'npm run install:all'
Configuration in package.json to start both frontend and backend concurrently with 'npm run dev'
